description: 90-day learning pathway for Basic React tailored to a 21-year-old male Computer Science student in Pune, India, who prefers video tutorials.

pathway.summary: Introduction to React and Setting up Development Environment

tasks.description: Learn about React's core concepts and its benefits.
tasks.expectedOutcome: Understand what React is and why it's used.

tasks.description: Set up Node.js, npm, and create a new React application using create-react-app.

resources.title: Setting Up a React Development Environment

tasks.description: Learn JSX syntax and how to write HTML-like structures in JavaScript.
Learn about functional and class components and how to create them.
tasks.expectedOutcome: Ability to create functional and class components.

tasks.description: Learn how to pass data from parent to child components using props.
tasks.expectedOutcome: Ability to pass data down the component tree.

tasks.description: Learn how to manage component-specific data using state.
tasks.expectedOutcome: Ability to manage state within a component.

tasks.description: Learn how to handle user events like clicks, form submissions, etc.
tasks.expectedOutcome: Ability to handle user interactions in React.

tasks.description: Learn how to conditionally render different elements based on state or props.
tasks.expectedOutcome: Ability to show or hide elements based on conditions.

tasks.description: Learn how to render lists of data dynamically using map and provide unique keys.
tasks.expectedOutcome: Ability to render lists of data efficiently.

resources.title: Rendering Lists in React with Keys

tasks.description: Learn how to create and handle forms in React, including controlled and uncontrolled components.
tasks.expectedOutcome: Ability to create and manage forms.

tasks.description: Learn the basics of React Hooks, focusing on useState for state management and useEffect for side effects.
tasks.expectedOutcome: Ability to use useState and useEffect hooks.

tasks.description: Explore different ways to style React components: inline styles, CSS stylesheets, and CSS modules.
tasks.expectedOutcome: Ability to style React components effectively.

tasks.description: Learn how to fetch data from an API using useEffect and update the component's state.
tasks.expectedOutcome: Ability to fetch and display data from an API.

tasks.description: Start building a simple Todo app to consolidate learned concepts. Implement adding tasks.
tasks.expectedOutcome: A functional Todo app with task adding capability.

tasks.description: Continue building the Todo app. Implement deleting and completing tasks.
tasks.expectedOutcome: A complete Todo app with add, delete, and complete functionalities.
tasks.taskTitle: Todo App - Deleting and Completing Tasks

tasks.description: Review all concepts learned over the past 12 weeks. Build another small project or refactor the Todo app.
tasks.expectedOutcome: Solid understanding of React basics and ability to apply them.
